content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="f of x, equals, the fraction with numerator 3 times x to the twentieth power, and denominator 4 times e to the x power, plus, 8 times x to the twentieth power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="x greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a horizontal asymptote to the graph of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: There is no horizontal asymptote to the graph of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

topic.text: 1.15: Connecting Limits at Infinity and Horizontal Asymptotes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
